players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "I have important information: Diana is the mafioso. We need to act fast and vote her out to protect the town."
Diana: "Diana is being accused without any proof. Bob’s rush to judgment looks suspicious—why target me so quickly? Let’s focus on gathering real evidence before making decisions."
Diana: "I find it odd that Bob is so quick to accuse me without any evidence while Alice has said nothing. Alice, do you have any thoughts or information to share with us?"

Bob: "I understand the need for caution, but waiting too long could cost us the game. My investigation is reliable—Diana is the mafioso. Alice, your silence is concerning; please share your thoughts."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice

You: "I understand the need for caution, but waiting too long could cost us the game. My investigation is reliable—Diana is the mafioso. Alice, your silence is concerning; please share your thoughts."
